channel.title: instances on CDS - Continuous Delivery Service
channel.description: Recent content in instances on CDS - Continuous Delivery Service

item.title: export
item.description: cdsctl template instances export Get instances for a CDS workflow template as yaml file Synopsis Get instances for a CDS workflow template as yaml file cdsctl template instances export [TEMPLATE-PATH] [flags] Examples cdsctl template instances group-name/template-slug Options --filter-params stringArray Specify filter on params for template like --filter-params paramKey=paramValue, wil return only instances that have params that match. Options inherited from parent commands -c, --context string cdsctl context name -f, --file string set configuration file --insecure (SSL) This option explicitly allows curl to perform "insecure" SSL connections and transfers.
